scripts.copy: cp -r assets build && mkdir -p build/reveal.js && cp -r node_modules/reveal.js/{lib,plugin,css} build/reveal.js && cp -r build/reveal.js/lib/font/source-sans-pro/ build/
scripts.assets: npm run copy && npm run images
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run assets && npm run js && npm run html && npm run css
scripts.build-watch: npm run clear && npm run build && concurrent "onchange assets/**/* -v -- npm run assets" "onchange app/**/*.ts -v -- npm run js" "onchange app/**/*.css -v -- npm run css" "onchange app/**/*.html -v -- npm run html"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build && git init . && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy"; git push "git@github.com:blakeembrey/typescript-talk.git" master:gh-pages --force && rm -rf .git
